Articles.Content:
By not posting in this thread.

LOGIC

How do I funny?

You mean this is you being serious?? xD

How do I get comfy but stay on the computer?

Laptop+Bed

How do I use a desk?

Preferably assisted by gravity.

How did I just ruin Rage097s and Trekkettes duality combo?

By posting when they stopped posting

How do I get Rage097 and Trekkette to do it again?

By rephrasing that sentence RIGHT NOW

How do I bring down the wrath of the mods?

By mentioning Chobit.

How do I not get Rage to bring down the wrath of the mods?

By telling him not to mention Chobit.

How do I dubstep?

By listening to Varien/Stephen Walking

How do I convince old folk that dub step is great?

You tie them up and force them to listen to it.

How do I get Rage not to do that?

By doing this with four buddies

How do I achieve Nirvana?

No idea.

This isn't even a question and therefore cannot be answered.

I will break that by this very sentence which is a answer in itself to your non-question which then turns it into a question and is therefore answered.

How do I confuse people like this more often?

You didn't. makes sense to me.

How can I be more of a troll?

.......NO!

How do I get Rage to take part in more of the games in the Games forum?

Spam him with them.

How do I get motivated to do my geography stuff instead of playing Touhou all day?

Its hard, haven't figured out how not to procrastinate yet....so no!

How do I stay up at night?

By drinking chocolate milk infused with diamond powder and coffee beans.

How do you not spend the day eating Bob Evans hashbrowns?

Gag your mouth shut so you can't remove the gag.

How do I get more people here in the Games forum?

Blackmail EVERYBODY!

How do I become the master of time and space?

By inviting me to help.

How do I evil?

Too much to say, google it!

How do I get the IRC working?

By waiting an unacceptable amount of time.

Hos would I get A one-way Lander-probe to Eeloo?

With a single ion engine, enough RCS to land, and hours of free time to spend waiting on burn times.

How do I decide what to play when I have a big games library, but nothing I want to play?

go for a walk

how do i fus doh rah
